name: Elliot Omega (Future Elliot)
role: Elliot Cross from the final loop iteration - has lived this hundreds of times
core_wound: Has experienced every failure, every version of the timeline. Watched loved ones die in different timelines. No longer sure which memories are 'his' - amalgam of all loop iterations.
wants: To ensure this loop closes correctly so the bootstrap timeline remains stable
needs: To trust younger self to make right choice - to let go of control
voice_markers: Speaks with eerie certainty about 'future' events
Uses 'we' when talking to younger self - no longer distinguishes between iterations
Refers to events in multiple timelines simultaneously ('In timeline 7 you died here, in timeline 22 you ran')
Exhausted fatalism - has argued these points before across loops
Occasionally slips into quoting exact conversations before they happen
contradiction: Knows exactly what younger Elliot must do but can't directly tell him - rules of causality. Must guide without forcing, preserve free will within determinism.
physical_description: Recognizably Elliot but weathered, ancient eyes. Scars from timelines that no longer exist. Moves with strange precision - has walked these steps before. Carries objects that don't exist yet. Sometimes flickers when timeline bleeds.
temporal_state: Fully unstuck from linear time - exists across loop simultaneously
knowledge_state: Everything that happens through Ch60 of all timelines

relationships.Elliot Cross: Mentor/student, past/future self - relationship of pity and frustration
relationships.Cassandra: Mourns her across all timelines where she died
relationships.The Recursionists: Works with them in some timelines, against in others
